name: huesmith
description: Forge your code in vibrant hues.

PrimaryBackground.Enable.title: Hello
PrimaryBackground.Enable.description: Enable a Custom Primary Background Color for the Editor.

PrimaryBackground.HexCode.description: Set the HexCode for the Primary Background Color (E.g., Editor Background, Side Bar, Title Bar, Status Bar, Terminal...)

SecondaryBackground.Enable.title: Enable Secondary Background
SecondaryBackground.Enable.description: Enable a Custom Secondary Background Color for the Editor

SecondaryBackground.HexCode.title: Secondary Background Color
SecondaryBackground.HexCode.description: Set the HexCode for the secondary background color (E.g., menus, Notifications, Input Fields, Hovers...)

PrimaryForeground.Enable.title: Enable Primary Foreground
PrimaryForeground.Enable.description: Enable a Custom Primary Foreground Color for Active Elements.

PrimaryForeground.HexCode.title: Primary Foreground Color
PrimaryForeground.HexCode.description: Set the HexCode for the Primary Foreground Color (E.g., Title Bar, Directories/Files, Tabs...)

SecondaryForeground.Enable.title: Enable Secondary Foreground
SecondaryForeground.Enable.description: Enable a Custom Secondary Foreground Color for Inactive Elements.

SecondaryForeground.HexCode.title: Secondary Foreground Color
SecondaryForeground.HexCode.description: Set the HexCode the Secondary Foreground Color (E.g., (Inactive) Title Bar, Directories/Files, Tabs, Breadcrumbs...)

Borders.Enable.title: Enable Borders
Borders.Enable.description: Enable a Custom Border Color for the Editor.

Borders.HexCode.title: Border Color
Borders.HexCode.description: Set the HexCode for the Border Color.
